meanings.sent1: The fairy's wings had an unworldliest shimmer to them.
meanings.sent2: The mystical creature had an unworldliest aura about it.
meanings.sent3: The alien's unworldliest appearance caused quite a stir in the town.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an unworldliest quality, as if it came from a different realm.
meanings.sent5: The starlit sky painted an unworldliest scene above us.

meanings.definition: Lacking knowledge or experience of the world; naive
meanings.sent1: The young child's unworldliest view of the world was endearing.
meanings.sent2: She had the unworldliest belief that everyone was inherently good.
meanings.sent3: His unworldliest trust in strangers sometimes led to funny situations.
meanings.sent4: The puppy's unworldliest curiosity got it into mischief often.
meanings.sent5: Their unworldliest innocence was a refreshing change in the cynical world.
